description:
This course is for the benefit of everyone. If financial constraints prevent you from enrolling, simply send me a message and I will give you access to all of my courses for free.

This training will give you the fundamental skills necessary to take online courses well and use computers well. This course is designed for individuals who are just getting started with computers. This course will show you basic computer skills. This course is also designed for people who want to know how to get the most out of online courses.

With high-quality video lectures, you will learn all of the following about using your computer:

  • Learn how to copy and paste
  • Learn how to use undo and redo
  • Learn how to use "find" to quickly locate information
  • Learn how to take screenshots
  • Learn how to view your computer's properties
  • Learn how CC & BCC are used for in email
  • Learn how to use email attachments
  • Learn how to use Google drive
  • Learn how to use a Google calendar to manage your time
  • Learn how to successfully take classes online

This class is guaranteed to teach you fundamental skills for using your computer. Once enrolled, you will have access to this course for the rest of your life. You will always be able to come back to this class to review material or to learn new material. Try this course for yourself and see how quickly and easily you too can learn to more effectively use your computer.
title: Taking Online Classes - Skills To Help You Succeed
